gui

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    JavaFX application controller

    Runs the server by `Runtime` from outside and gets the output and prints to the screen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Controller.ServerHandler
      Class for getting output from server When the server stops, it stops the application.
